Article Title: NSE warns against these Telegram channels offering securities market tips
Article Text:
‘Bullish Stocks’

‘Bharat Trading Forum'

Here’s what NSE said in its advisory

How to know if a stock broker is genuine or not?

National Stock Exchange of India (NSE) has issued an advisory for investors against two Telegram channels offering assured returns in the stock market along with market tips. In two different advisories, NSE has called out against Telegram channels namedand. It has also pointed out names and mobile numbers of the individuals running these channels.NSE said that it has been brought to the notice of the Exchange that individual named “Ranveer Singh” and “Ajay Kumar Sharma” operating through mobile number “9076273946” and “7878337029”, and telegram channel named “Bullish Stocks” and “Bharat Trading Forum” , are providing assured returns on investment in stock market and offering to handle trading account of investor by asking investors to share their Login ID/password.In its advisory, NSE advises investors to practice caution and not subscribe to any such scheme/product offered by any person/entity offering indicative/assured/guaranteed returns in the stock market as the same is prohibited by law. NSE further states that investors are advised not to share their trading credentials such as user id/password with anyone.The National Stock Exchange has provided a facility of “Know/Locate your Stock Broker” under the link - https://www.nseindia.com/invest/find-a-stock-broker on its website. Users can check the details of the registered member and its authorized persons to verify their authenticity.Further, the designated bank accounts named as client bank accounts to receive/pay money from/to investors as disclosed by the trading members to Exchange are also displayed under the said link. Investors are advised to check the details while dealing with any person/entity, NSE advisory reads.
Article Summary: National Stock Exchange of India (NSE) has issued an advisory for investors against two Telegram channels offering assured returns in the stock market along with market tips. In two different advisories, NSE has called out against Telegram channels namedand. It has also pointed out names and mobile numbers of the individuals running these channels.

After announcing mobile tariffs hike last week, Vodafone Idea’s new prepaid plans will go live today. This comes a day after Airtel and Reliance Jio’s plan came into effect on July 3. This is the first major rate increase by telcos since 2021.In a press release, Vodafone Idea said that it also aims to invest in launching 5G services. Vi is planning significant investments over the next few quarters to further enhance the 4G experience as well as launch of 5G services,” Vi added.After the price hike, Vodafone Idea’s 28-day plan now costs Rs 199, a Rs 20 increase from the previous Rs 179.Similarly, the 84-day plan price has increased to Rs 509 (from Rs 459). The plan offers 6GB of data alongside unlimited calling and 300 SMS.Vi’s annual plan now costs Rs 1999 (previously Rs 1799) and provides 24GB of data with unlimited calling and 300 SMS. Price has gone up for 1-day add-on plan which now costs Rs 22 (from Rs 19) for 1GB of additional data.
Article Summary: After announcing mobile tariffs hike last week, Vodafone Idea’s new prepaid plans will go live today. This is the first major rate increase by telcos since 2021. Vi is planning significant investments over the next few quarters to further enhance the 4G experience and launch of 5G services.

Article Title: Why Apple Mac users must update their ChatGPT desktop app right now
Article Text:
What’ the ChatGPT macOS bug all about

How to keep yourself safe

OpenAI launched its ChatGPT desktop app for Mac last month, offering features like text generation and code writing through chatbot interaction. Now, a recent report has raised security concerns , suggesting a flaw in the app could have exposed users' conversations with the chatbot to hackers or malicious apps. OpenAI has fixed the ChatGPT app bug.“We are aware of this issue and have shipped a new version of the application which encrypts these conversations.We’re committed to providing a helpful user experience while maintaining our high security standards as our technology evolves,” OpenAI spokesperson Taya Christianson told The Verge .Developer Pedro Vieito spotted the bug and said that all the conversations that a user has had with the chatbot was being stored on the computer in plain text. This means that if a hacker or a malicious app had access to the computer, they could have easily read those conversations.This was dangerous because the app may have 'skipped' the “sandboxing” security control system that Apple has in its products. Sandboxing is a security feature that isolates apps and their data, preventing them from accessing other data of the system or from other apps without permission. This essentially protects user data from unauthorised access by other apps or malware.Unlike iPhones where all apps are sandboxed,macOS adopted the system where apps are required to explicitly ask for permission to access data outside their sandbox. Notably, most chat apps that handle sensitive data typically utilise sandboxing for an extra layer of security and apparently, the ChatGPT app wasn’t sandboxed.The first advice is to only download apps from the official app store because they undergo scrutiny before being made available for users. In case of chatbots, do not share sensitive data while having a conversation because the data may be used to train the AI models.
Article Summary: OpenAI launched its ChatGPT desktop app for Mac last month. It offers features like text generation and code writing through chatbot interaction. Now, a recent report has raised security concerns, suggesting a flaw in the app could have exposed users' conversations with the chatbot to hackers.

Article Title: ICC T20: How to and where to watch live Indian cricket team's welcome ceremony today
Article Text:
Indian team

victory parade

: Time and location

When and where to watch the T20 World Cup victory parade

Channel:

Live streaming

Recap of India vs South Africa final match

India lifted the ICC T20 World Cup after defeating South Africa in the finals on June 29. Captain Rohit Sharma-led Indian Cricket team is returning home in the wee hours of June 4. The departure of the Indian squad was delayed due to Hurricane Beryl.The Air India special charter flight AIC24WC -- Air India Champions 24 World Cup -- left for Delhi from Grantley Adams International Airport on Wednesday at 4:50 am local time and it will arrive at around 6:20 am."The flight will land at Delhi airport tomorrow at 6 am. The team will meet PM Narendra Modi at 11 am at his residence. After this, the team will fly to Mumbai, where a ceremony has been organised," BCCI vice-president Rajeev Shukla told news agency PTI.The Indian team will arrive in Mumbai at 4:00pm and are expected to reach the National Centre for Performing Arts (NCPA), as they will start a two-hour long open bus parade. The open bus parade will start approximately at 5:00pm from the NCPA and will go on for about two hours before they reach the Wankhede Stadium.BCCI secretary Jay has invited all fans to join the victory parade on Thursday evening (June 4). In a post on X, formerly Twitter, "Join us for the Victory Parade honouring Team India's World Cup win! Head to Marine Drive and Wankhede Stadium on July 4th from 5:00 pm onwards to celebrate with us! Save the date! #TeamIndia," Shah wrote on 'X', formerly Twitter.The ICC T20 World Cup 2024 victory parade will be live-streamed on several platforms as well as it will be telecasted on TV as well.Star Sports Network will telecast the victory parade live on the network channels including Start Sports 1 and Star Sports 1 Hindi at starting 9 am.Star Sports will also livestream the parade on its YouTube channel. Additionally, viewers can watch it live on BCCI.TV click here In a thrilling T20 World Cup final, India edged out South Africa by 7 runs. After a shaky start, Virat Kohli's crucial 76 off 59 balls helped India post 176/7. Jasprit Bumrah (2-18) and Hardik Pandya (3-20) were instrumental in restricting South Africa to 169/8 despite their valiant effort. Kohli was named player of the match for his vital innings. This victory secured India's second T20 World Cup title and ended their 11-year ICC trophy drought. Jasprit Bumrah was honoured as the player of the tournament for his outstanding bowling performances throughout.
Article Summary: India lifted the ICC T20 World Cup after defeating South Africa in the finals on June 29. Captain Rohit Sharma-led Indian Cricket team is returning home in the wee hours of June 4. Air India special charter flight AIC24WC -- Air India Champions 24 World Cup -- left for Delhi from Grantley Adams International Airport on Wednesday at 4:50 am local time.

Article Title: Google Chrome to get this new security feature soon: Details
Article Text: Google is reportedly working on adding a new feature to Chrome that will improve the browsers data and privacy quotient. A user who goes by the handle @Leopeva on X (formerly Twitter) has posted some screenshots revealing Chrome’s ability to automatically revoke website permissions automatically.The feature has been there on the desktop version of Google Chrome for a while now and it looks like the company is planning to bring the feature to Android version as well.According to the X post, the feature is already live in the Chrome Canary version of the browser.What is this feature?If you use Chrome on a desktop, it is possible you are familiar with the ‘Revoke website permission’ feature. If you are not, the feature is self-explanatory -- it revokes all the permissions from a website if you are not visiting it often.This applies to certain types of permissions like notifications, access to camera and microphone, etc.Now, the desktop version of Chrome offers a similar feature and it has been there for a while now. But, the feature has been missing from Android version and that seems to changing soon.When it will arrive in the stable versionThe feature, as mentioned, is available in the Chrome Canary built and we expect it to arrive soon in the stable build too. Based on some speculations, the feature could arrive in the Chrome 128 that’s expected to roll out in August.
Article Summary: Google is reportedly working on adding a new feature to Chrome that will improve the browsers data and privacy quotient. A user who goes by the handle @Leopeva on X (formerly Twitter) has posted some screenshots revealing Chrome’s ability to automatically revoke website permissions automatically. According to the X post, the feature is already live in the Chrome Canary version of the browser.

Article Title: Reliance Jio's new mobile tariff for postpaid and prepaid plans are live: What chairman Akash Ambani said
Article Text:
Reliance Jio has increased prices for its mobile services, effective July 3. Here's a breakdown of the changes:

Reliance Jio , India's biggest telecom service provider, recently announced a 12-27 per cent hike in mobile tariffs. The price increase came after over two and half years, with the last tariff hike announced in December 2021. The company has also made some changes in unlimited free 5G services for subscribers. The company has raised mobile service rates across almost all plans.Rivals Bharti Airtel and Vodafone Idea have followed Reliance Jio, and announced similar price hikes.According to TRAI data, Jio has over 47 crore mobile subscribers, holding a 41% market share.“The introduction of new plans is a step in the direction of furthering industry innovation and driving sustainable growth through investments in 5G and AI technology. Ubiquitous, high-quality, affordable internet is the backbone of Digital India and Jio takes pride in contributing to this. Jio will always put our country and customers first and will continue to invest for India," Reliance Jio Infocomm Chairman Akash M Ambani said in the statement.* Lowest recharge: Up from Rs 15 to Rs 19 (a 27% increase) for a 1GB data add-on.* Postpaid plans: The 75 GB plan increases from Rs 399 to Rs 449.* Popular unlimited plan: The 84-day plan with unlimited data previously priced at Rs 666 will now cost Rs 799 (a 20% hike).* Annual plans: Prices are going up 20-21%, with the Rs 1,559 plan becoming Rs 1,899 and the Rs 2,999 plan becoming Rs 3,599.* Medium-range plans: Expect a 19-21% price increase for these plans.* Unlimited 5G data is now limited to plans with 2GB or more daily data. Previously, plans above Rs 239 offered unlimited 5G. Now, those who need unlimited 5G with a plan below 2GB daily data will need
Article Summary: Reliance Jio has increased prices for its mobile services, effective July 3. The price increase came after over two and half years, with the last tariff hike announced in December 2021. The company has raised mobile service rates across almost all plans. Unlimited 5G data is now limited to plans with 2GB or more daily data. Bharti Airtel and Vodafone Idea have announced similar price hikes.

Article Title: FlightRadar shares an 'interesting update' on Air India flight 'AIC24WC' carrying Indian cricket team
Article Text: The Air India special chartered flight ' AIC24WC ', carrying the victorious Indian cricket team on their way back home has become one of the world's most-tracked flight on the flight tracking portal Flightradar24 in recent times after it took off from Barbados on Wednesday (June 3).Taking to microblogging platform X (formerly Twitter), the flight tracking portal posted, “Our most tracked flight right now —🏏 T20 World Cup champions India on their way home".According to the flight tracking portal's real-time data, 9,500-plus users are tracking the Air India flight carrying the T20 World Cup winner back home while filing this story.The flight's call sign represents India's World Cup triumph, with 'AIC' representing 'Air India Chartered flight' and '24WC' representing the 'T20 World Cup 2024' triumph.The Indian team is expected to reach New Delhi early on July 4 morning (6:20am) after departing from Barbados' Grantley Adams International Airport on Wednesday (July 3).The departure of the Indian squad was delayed due to Hurricane Beryl."The flight will land at Delhi airport tomorrow 6 am. The team will meet PMNarendra Modi at 11 am at his residence. After this, the team will fly to Mumbai, where a ceremony has been organised," BCCI vice-president Rajeev Shukla told PTI.The Indian team will arrive in Mumbai at 4:00pm and is expected to reach the National Centre for Performing Arts (NCPA), as they will start a two-hour long open bus parade.The open bus parade will start approximately at 5:00pm from the NCPA and will go on for about two hours before they reach the Wankhede Stadium.A felicitation event to honour the players and the squad members has been scheduled between 7:00pm to 7:30pm, after which the players will leave for their hotel.Captain Rohit Sharma also took to social media to welcome the fans. "We want to enjoy this special moment with all of you. So let's celebrate this win with a victory parade at Marine Drive & Wankhede on July 4th from 5:00pm onwards.It's coming home," Rohit posted on 'X'.BCCI secretary Jay Shah too welcomed all fans to join the victory parade on Thursday evening (June 4)."Join us for the Victory Parade honouring Team India's World Cup win! Head to Marine Drive and Wankhede Stadium on July 4th from 5:00 pm onwards to celebrate with us! Save the date! #TeamIndia," Shah wrote on 'X', formerly Twitter.
Article Summary: Air India flight carrying Indian cricket team has become one of the world's most-tracked flight on the flight tracking portal Flightradar24. The flight's call sign represents India's World Cup triumph, with 'AIC' representing 'Air India Chartered flight' and '24WC' representing the 'T20 World Cup 2024' triumph. The Indian team is expected to reach New Delhi early on July 4 morning.

Since its debut, the game has gained a distinctive niche among Indian gaming enthusiasts due to its vibrant graphics and intense gameplay. The regular release of redeem codes by the game's developers serves as an additional bonus for players.The redeem codes for Garena Free Fire Max can be used to win in-game items like weapons, diamonds, skins, and other valuable rewards.Comprising 12-digit alphanumeric combinations of capital letters and numbers, these codes enhance the gaming experience for players.By redeeming these codes, gamers can receive rewards such as a Rebel Academy Weapon Loot Crate, Revolt Weapon Loot Crate, Diamonds Voucher, and Fire Head Hunting Parachute. It's essential to note that these codes are accessible for a limited duration (up to 12 hours) and exclusively for the initial 500 users.

Article Title: Apple MacBook models with M4 chipsets may come with ‘paid’ AI features
Article Text:
Apple MacBook models with M4 chipset: Expected availability



Apple MacBook Pro models with M4 chipsets: What to expect



Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. According to a report by Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman, the rumoured MacBook Pro and MacBook Air machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple’s M4 chipsets -- the base M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max chipsets. The report also notes that the upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service which is expected to boost sales.Rumours suggest that Apple will soon release 14-inch and 16-inch models of MacBook Pros with M4 chips by the end of this year or early next year. Moreover, MacBook Air sizes are also in line for an early 2025 refresh.Currently, the only Apple devices with the M4 chip are the newest iPad Pro models . The most affordable option is the 11-inch iPad Pro with 256GB of storage which was launched at Rs 99,900.Gurman claims that both the MacBook Pro and MacBook Air won't see any design changes despite getting upgraded to the M4 chipsets. This comes after the 2021 redesign of the MacBook Pro with the M1 chip.He also suggested that a more significant visual overhaul might be coming in 2026, potentially coinciding with the adoption of OLED displays similar to the latest iPad Pro models.Similarly, the MacBook Air is also expected to wait until 2027 for a design refresh, five years after it departs from the wedge shape.Gurman acknowledges that a chip upgrade alone might not be enough to entice existing MacBook users to upgrade.To address this, Apple is reportedly considering a monthly subscription service that builds upon the free Apple Intelligence launching this fall.Additionally, Gurman claims Apple might integrate and potentially take a commission on third-party AI services like ChatGPT, mirroring their App Store model.
Article Summary: Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. The rumoured machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple’s M4 chipsets. The upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service.

Article Title: Elon Musk responds to Chinese girl who wants him to fix a bug in Tesla screen: Watch
Article Text: A young Tesla owner in China, Molly, has shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen.In a short video, Molly highlighted the issue she is facing with the touchscreen in her Tesla car. When she tries to draw on the touchscreen, previously drawn lines disappear as she adds new ones. With wide eyes and a clear explanation, she asks Mr.Musk to "fix an error" on her Tesla.The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself. Responding to the video, Musk simply replied "Sure," sparking further conversation online.Shared on X (formerly Twitter), the post quickly gained traction, garnering over a million views and 16,000 likes from users. Many users have also reacted to the video.Here are some of the reactions“this is a critical issue @elonmusk please fix it”“Oh please this is very concerning @elonmusk ! Help her”“halt all production until we resolve. please and thank you.”“Awww, she’s so adorable”
Article Summary: A young Tesla owner in China, Molly, shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen. The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself.

Article Title: iQoo Z9 Lite 5G smartphone to launch in India on July 15: Here’s what the smartphone may offer
Article Text:
iQoo Z9 Lite confirmed details

iQoo Z9 Lite expected specs and price

iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker iQoo has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15.The company posted on X (formerly known as Twitter) about the upcoming iQoo launch. “Taking it slow? - no more! A #FullyLoaded5G experience awaits you! #iQOOZ9Lite,” reads the post.Along with the launch date, iQoo has also shared a teaser image of the upcoming iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone.The company has confirmed that the yet-to-launch iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will sport a dual rear camera setup. The smartphone will feature a flat rear panel and display. The dual rear camera is placed inside a rectangular module located at the top left corner.The smartphone maker has also confirmed that the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will pack an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with 6GB of RAM. The smartphone will offer 128GB internal storage.iQoo Z9 Lite is said to sport a 6.56-inch HD+ LCD display which is expected to offer up to 90Hz of refresh rate. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor.The smartphone is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor and house a 5000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging support.Multiple online rumours suggest that the iQoo Z9 Lite may come with a starting price tag of Rs 10,000.
Article Summary: iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor. It is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.

Article Title: Credit card cyber fraud: Essential steps to safeguard your finance
Article Text:
Best tips to protect from credit card cyber fraud

Monitor account activity: Regularly review your credit card statements and transaction history for any unauthorised charges or suspicious activity.

Enable alerts: Set up transaction alerts through your bank or credit card issuer to receive notifications of any transactions made with your card.

Use strong and unique passwords: Secure your online banking and shopping accounts with strong passwords that include a combination of letters, numbers, and special characters. Avoid using information that is easily guessed, such as birth dates and names.

Enable 2-factor authentication: Utilise two-factor authentication (2FA) wherever possible to add an extra layer of security to your online accounts.

Be cautious of phishing scams: Avoid clicking on links or downloading attachments from unsolicited emails, messages, or websites that ask for your credit card information.

Shop only on secure websites: Ensure that the websites you use for online shopping are secure. To ensure secure browsing, ensure that the URL contains HTTPS and a padlock symbol in the address bar.

Use virtual credit card numbers: Some banks offer virtual credit card numbers for online transactions. These are temporary numbers that cannot be linked to your actual credit card account.

Keep your devices secure: Install antivirus software, keep your operating system and apps updated, and avoid connecting to unsecured public Wi-Fi networks when making online transactions.

Shred personal documents: Shred any documents containing sensitive information such as credit card statements or receipts before disposing of them.

Report lost or stolen cards immediately: Contact your bank or credit card issuer immediately if your card is lost or stolen to prevent unauthorised use.

Also read

Credit card fraud involves cybercriminals obtaining sensitive credit card information such as the card number, PIN, CVV, and other necessary details to make unauthorised purchases or transfers.While credit card fraud detection systems can aid in identifying fraudulent transactions to some extent, fraudsters often manage to inflict substantial financial harm on victims before being apprehended.Therefore, it's crucial to familiarise oneself with various types of credit card fraud and take proactive measures to avoid becoming a victim. Being vigilant and informed can significantly reduce the risk of falling prey to such fraudulent activities.Despite the low or zero liabilities for credit card users, fraud or identity theft can still cause significant inconvenience for both customers and banks. While the bank's zero-liability policy protects credit card users from financial losses if they report the fraud within 60 days, they must endure the process of detecting the theft, notifying the bank, obtaining a replacement card, paying any associated fees, and updating all automatic payment accounts.The rise of awareness among credit card users is essential for early detection and prevention of fraud, helping banks address potential issues proactively.
Article Summary: The rise of awareness among credit card users is essential for early detection and prevention of fraud. Fraud or identity theft can still cause significant inconvenience for both customers and banks. Being vigilant and informed can significantly reduce the risk of falling prey to such fraudulent activities.

Article Title: Virat Kohli's this 'Jai Hind post' becomes the 'most-liked' ever on Instagram
Article Text:
Virat Kohli’s Instagram post

Virat Kohli announced retirement from T20 playing format

Virat Kohli has smashed another record, this time off the field. His celebratory Instagram post following India's T20 World Cup victory has become the most-liked photo ever posted on an Indian account.The emotional post, featuring a collage of Team India celebrating their win, garnered over 19 million likes and counting at the time of writing.Kohli's caption, simply stating "Couldn't have dreamt of a better day than this. God is great and I bow my head in gratitude. We finally did it 🇮🇳❤️🇮🇳❤️jai hind ❤️❤️❤️," resonated deeply with fans across the nation.The previous record for the most-liked Instagram post in India was held by Bollywood couple Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra 's wedding announcement. However, Kohli's post surpassed that record with a significant margin.The comments section of his post was flooded with congratulatory messages from celebrities, athletes, and fans alike. Even international sports stars joined the celebration, with comments from MMA fighter Conor McGregor and Brazilian footballer Vinicius Jr. showering Kohli with praise.Virat Kohli announced his retirement from the T20 International format after leading his team to a thrilling victory in the 2024 T20 World Cup final. "This was my last T20 game playing for India," Kohli declared. "This World Cup was the perfect culmination for this chapter in my career. Time for the next generation to take the T20 game forward."
Article Summary: Virat Kohli's Instagram post following India's T20 World Cup victory has become the most-liked photo ever posted on an Indian account. The post, featuring a collage of Team India celebrating their win, garnered over 19 million likes and counting at the time of writing.

Steps to use Indian Bike Driving 3D Cheat Codes

Begin by starting the Indian Bike Driving 3D game on your device.

Look for the button featuring a phone icon, typically located at the bottom left corner of the game screen. Click on this icon to open the phone menu.

Within the phone menu, find the handset icon, usually coloured green and positioned in the middle. Click on this icon to proceed.

Upon clicking the handset icon, a contact list will appear on the screen. Look for an icon featuring nine orange circles at the bottom left corner of this screen. Click on it to access the number entry interface.

In the number entry interface, use your device's keypad to input one of the provided cheat codes. Each cheat code corresponds to a specific reward mentioned in the description.

The annual plan now costs Rs 1,999 with the same benefits. These changes aim to support budget-constrained consumers while maintaining service quality.

Bharti Airtel has announced a price hike across all its prepaid and postpaid plans. Airtel's revised tariff plans will be effective from today, July 3. As announced by the company, it has increased the price of its entry-level plans by 70 paise, 'in order to eliminate any burden on budget challenged consumers.'It must be noted here that while the plans have become costlier, benefits like data, call minutes, etc remain the same.In total, Airtel has increased the price of 15 prepaid and postpaid plans. These prices apply to all circles, including Bharti Hexacom Ltd. Circles. Reliance Jio and Vodafone Idea have also increased their tariff rates by up to 22%.The revised tariff increases the price of Rs 179 monthly plan to Rs 199. The plan will continue to offer 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMS per day. Validity of the plan remains 28 days. Similarly, the annual plan of Rs 1,799 offering 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMSes every day will now cost Rs 1,999.Airtel's daily data add-on plans now come at Rs 22 onwards (a hike of Rs 3 from the previous Rs 19).Coming to Airtel's postpaid plans, the price now ranges from Rs 449 to Rs 1,199. Daily data plans offering up to 3GB data per day now come with starting price of Rs 265.
Article Summary: Bharti Airtel has increased the price of its monthly plan to Rs 199, offering 2GB data daily, unlimited calling, and 100 SMS per day. The annual plan now costs Rs 1,999 with the same benefits. These changes aim to support budget- constrained consumers while maintaining service quality.

Article Title: Why Anand Mahindra ‘called’ ChatGPT after India’s Cricket World Cup win
Article Text:
Why Anand Mahindra ‘called’ ChatGPT

“Hello Chat GPT 4.O

Please make me a graphic image showing the Indian Cricket team as Superheroes.

Because they were SuperCool till the end.

The greatest gift of this final to India was that it didn’t come easy. It almost slipped out of their grasp. But they never lost the match in their minds.

Reminding all of us that being a Superhero never comes without a fierce determination to win and a Never Give In attitude.

Jai Ho! #IndiavsSA #T20WorldCupFinal” reads the post.

Here how users reacted to the post

Team India becomes T20 World Cup 2024 champions

Mahindra Group chairman Anand Mahindra is known for his active social media presence and witty remarks. Following India's dominating victory against South Africa in the T20 World Cup final, Mahindra posted a congratulatory message on X (formerly known as Twitter) with the help of ChatGPT .Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team, requesting that the cricketers be depicted as superheroes.Mahindra also shared the ChatGPT-generated image on X. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag.Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final. After a tense battle against South Africa at the iconic Kensington Oval, India emerged champions with a narrow seven-run win. Virat Kohli's dominant 76 and Rohit Sharma 's sharp captaincy were instrumental in securing the win. Following the game, Virat Kohli also announced his retirement from the T20 format.
Article Summary: Anand Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag. Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final.

Article Title: Shark Tank Judge Anupam Mittal on India semi-final win: Chalo 'yeh bhi' hisaab barabar
Article Text:
Here's what Anupam Mittal wrote on X

How other brands celebrated India's win

India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. After losing the toss against England, India scored 171/7 in 20 overs at the Guyana National Stadium. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.Like other matches, India's victory over England is being celebrated across the country.Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal shared his joy over India's win via a post on microblogging platform - X, formerly Twitter.In his post, Mittal wrote "1947 me India se nikala aur 2024 me West Indies se,". Adding further, he said "Chalo 🇬🇧2022 ka bhi hisaab barabar 🇮🇳🏆," pointing at 2022 India's loss against England in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-final ."don't know about english tea, but english tears are delicious 😂 #INDvENG," food delivery app Zomato wrote in a X post."Just packing ; Revenge order for Semi-Final in 2022 😤," Walmart-owned Flipkart wrote. “Hitman has once again added hope to the cart 🙏," the e-commerce company wrote in another post on X.Quick commerce app Blinkit shared an image of billboard that read "Dear England, if you are thirsty, we can deliver a bo'ah of wo'ah in 10 minutes."
Article Summary: India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.

Article Title: Microsoft Xbox server outage fixed, here’s what the company said
Article Text:
What caused the Xbox outage?

Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide who were unable to sign into their Xbox accounts. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running.The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST and lasted for several hours till morning next day.Xbox started an investigation which lasted for hours.However, the company did not reveal the exact reason of what resulted in the outage, but kept continuously updating users about it.After the service was restored, official handle of Xbox Support on X (formerly Twitter) said “Users should no longer be encountering issues signing in to Xbox Live and services. Thank you for your patience, game on!”.As per Downdetector, thousands of Xbox Live users were affected by the outage. The company said that it was “aware that some users have been disconnected from Xbox Live. We're investigating! Please follow here and on our status page for updates. http://Xbox.com/status”.While the status page read “You may not be able to sign-in to your Xbox profile, may be disconnected while signed in, or have other related problems,” the notice read. “Features that require sign-in like most games, apps and social activity won’t be available.”
Article Summary: Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running. The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max may offer longer battery life
Article Text:
Apple to use steel battery case to tackle overheating

Apple iPhone 16 series rumours

Apple iPhone 16 series is expected to launch in September and in the run up to the debut, the rumour mill is already churning out scores of leaks. According to another such leak, iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life .Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max, which will result in longer battery life.“My latest supply chain survey indicates the energy density (Wh/kg) of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max will increase, which has the benefit of longer battery life with the same battery size or lower battery size with the same battery life,” he said in a post.However, with increase in energy density of the battery cells, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case .“Increasing the energy density of the battery cells will increase the battery temperature when running. To avoid overheating the battery, Apple uses the stainless steel battery case for the first time as a thermal solution ,” Kuo said.While stainless steel may not be as effective as aluminium in dissipating heat, “it is more robust and less susceptible to corrosion, so in addition to dissipating heat, the stainless steel battery case provides better protection for the battery and the iPhone system.”Kuo noted that the use of a stainless steel battery case will reduce the difficulty of removing the battery, hence, helping Apple to “comply with the European Union’s requirements for mobile phone batteries’ replaceability in the future.”“If the mass production of this new battery design (upgraded energy density of battery cells & adoption of the stainless steel battery case) goes well and the feedback is favourable, this new battery design will be adopted in all 2H25 new iPhone models,” Kuo noted.The iPhone 16 series is rumoured to replace physical buttons with touch-sensitive buttons that simulate a press with haptic feedback. The camera layout might shift to a vertical design, unlike the current diagonal setup. The customisable Action button, currently on Pro models, might be available on all iPhone 16 models.Under the hood, the standard iPhone 16 and Plus models might use the A18 chip , while Pro models could get the A18 Pro chip. Meanwhile, the display size for iPhone 16 and Plus (6.1-inch and 6.7-inch) might remain the same, but the refresh rate could improve.
Article Summary: iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life. Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells. With increase in energy density, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case.
